member.name: T:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser
member.summary: Parser for IIS log files.

member.name: P:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.IgnoredExtensions
member.summary: Specifies list of filename extensions to ignore.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.ParseFieldsDirective(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the fields directive.
member.param: The line that contains the fields directive.
member.remarks: Not all log files contain all fields, and fields may not be in a pre-defined order. The log file contains a directive that lists the fields present, and the order in which the fields appear. This method is used for extracting the field order from that line.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.ParseDirective(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a directive.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.ParseLogEntry(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a log file entry.
member.param: The log file line to parse.
member.returns: A LogFileEntry object if line was parsed successfully, or Nothing otherwise.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a log file and returns its contents.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.ParseLogFile(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Parses supplied log file.
member.param: A list of filename extensions to ignore.
member.returns: Web accesses logged in the file.

member.name: M:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParser.ParseLogFileFolder(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Parses all *.log files in supplied folder.
member.param: Path to folder containing log files.
A list of filename extensions to ingore.
member.returns: Web access logged in log files present in supplied folder.

member.name: T:WebLogAnalyzer.LogParserException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when the log parser encounters a problem.
